nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure I like the idea of defaulting by hardcoding it in the source. It feels like a maintenance burden having to edit both this and the config and may cause them getting out of sync in future updates.

The configuration-loading code is quite a mess, it's in dire need of a refactor - at least to use an object-mapping solution with defaults. I'll have to investigate if Night-Config will allow this, or explore writing my own TOML parser/serializer and slipping that into Configurate 4 (since zml told me he's not interested).
I right now changed this behaviour by creating a temporary default config copied from the jar file, which is used to retrieve the default values from.
Yikes, this is what I feared. Maybe I need to work on a proper TOML serializer for Configurate!
